column5: Mark Kulik, you sir, are my hero.  Everyone, SLAMMERS own!  Best dropshot bait ever made.  Check the pics to prove it from today.
Super job steverow..... Those are very good lookin' specimens.  Thanks for sharing! Leechman
Very nice. I tried drop shotting a bit but don't have the patience for it! But it definitely works! Thanks for sharing.
awseom fish man...smallies are definatly on!!
Nice fish Steve. You should be a shoo-in for the BPS Associate Classic!!
Nice fish!  That Smallie is huge!!!
So whats yer excuss for sunday then  Real nice fish bud.  Slammers are a great bait.
Nice fish.  Either that smally is huge or your left arm is longer than your right. lol j/k

Sorry bushart,I gapped posting this for ya. Mark Kulik, who is a member here and a great tourney angler, has come out with an awesome drop shot bait.  Heres his site.  http://www.strikezonetournamentbaits.com/
thanks guys, MArk's baits are awesome, I suggest you all pick some up!
Hey, those are beauties. You fish much on Lake Scugog or the river?
that smallmouth in the secnod picture almost had me mistaken it was a largemouth !
same here, the markings are quite nice, and a very clean fish.
